headline: Hilton Worldwide Holdings (NYSE:HLT) Sees 11% Stock Price Decline Over the Last Week
summary: Hilton Worldwide Holdings (NYSE:HLT) experienced an 11% decline in its stock price last week, amid a highly volatile market environment influenced by geopolitical trade tensions, including newly imposed tariffs by the U.S. and China's retaliatory measures. Although these broader economic and market uncertainties heavily impacted various sectors, Hilton's decline was in line with general market trends, which saw the S&P 500 drop 12%. Despite this challenging backdrop, the hospitality sector,...
